title: Its Always Late For Freedom Hamishe Baraye Azadi Dir Ast 2007 1080p

sources.title: Its Always Late For Freedom Hamishe Baraye Azadi Dir Ast 2007 1080p
sources.description: Directed by: Mehrdad Oskouei Date of birth: 12 September 1969 Teheran, Iran Writing credits: Mehrdad Oskouei Music: Ali Samadpour Year: 2007 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Color Runtime: 52 min. Synopsis In this portrait of a Tehranian youth correctional centre, Oskouei introduces us to a group of teenage boys serving sentences related to violence, theft and drugs. We follow three in particular who demonstrate unlikely blends of world-weary toughness, street-smarts and a mature compassion.
